parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Automatic switch off time
parameter.description: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time (in seconds)

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: RF Off command
parameter.description: Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the

options.option: Switch on if load is off else switch off

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Speed for fast dimming
parameter.description: Time to dim on button presses and Set command (if it has no duration specified). If not 0, dimming will be done smoothly to preserve bulb life. Set in 10ms steps.

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Speed for slow dimming
parameter.description: Time to dim on button presses and Set command (if it has no duration specified). If not 0, dimming will be done smoothly to preserve bulb life. Set in 10ms steps.

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Behavior when ON received
parameter.description: Defines the dim level on command 'ON'. On default he dimmer restores last dim level. This parameter allows configuring the maximum level on second On command (if already On) or to always switch on to maximum level.

options.option: If on already, set to maximum

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Baby dimming time
parameter.description: Time to dim on double click Off button for Baby-Dim function. This function works only if the load is operated by single press and hold button action. If enabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This w

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Baby target level
parameter.description: Target percentage level on which to stop while executing Baby Dimming. Can be 0 to completely switch off the light.

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Baby target level
parameter.description: Typical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks. Set in 10ms steps.

parameter.name: config_17_1
parameter.label: 17: Limit minimum light level
parameter.description: Minimum level should be greater than maximum.

parameter.name: config_18_1
parameter.label: 18: Limit maximum light level
parameter.description: Maximum level should be greater than minimum. Set to 0 to act as a switch.

parameter.name: config_19_1
parameter.label: 19: Dim Level on 'Switch On'
parameter.description: defines how the dimmer hall react on a simple ON Command. Set to 0 to restore last level, otherwise sets dim level.

parameter.name: config_51_1
parameter.label: 51: Pause before pulse
parameter.description: NB: Do not touch these settings if you are not sure what they mean! For dimmable LEDs and CFL with bypass use value 1. For other bulbs use default value.

parameter.label: 52: Pause after pulse
parameter.description: NB: Do not touch these settings if you are not sure what they mean! For dimmable LEDs and CFL with bypass use value 40. For other bulbs use default value.
